original_text: When we had come in sight of Cyprus, leaving it on the left we sailed to Syria and landed at Tyre, for there the ship was to unload its cargo.
korean_text: 구브로를 바라보고 이를 왼편에 두고 수리아로 항해하여 두로에서 상륙하니 거기서 배의 짐을 풀려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: When we had come in sight of Cyprus
for there the ship was to unload its cargo
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 배가 화물을 내려야 했기 때문이다
